name: The Era of AI-Manage the world
name_original: The Era of AI-Manage the world
description:
In 2030, you are the most authoritative expert in the field of artificial intelligence in the world, and the boss of the technology company "Dea". Your company has been able to make robots and make them work instead of human, but they are not smart enough and have no consciousness. Now you need to research new artificial intelligence technology, constantly reform the robot, and let them work around the world. In addition, you can buy the top technology companies in the world and get their black technology. Enable artificial intelligence era!

【FEATURES】
·Make and transform your robots and let them learn all kinds of knowledge.
·At any time to let the robot to work or to maintain world peace, you will get rich reward.
·Dispatch robots to work around the world to replace human, and the salaries they receive will be given to you.
·Constantly develop new artificial intelligence technology, so that your robot will be more and more powerful. (more and more money)
·Let the "smart" robot go to the world's top technology companies, and then strive to enter the board.
·Acquire the world's top technology companies, not only get dividends each year, but also get their black technology.
·Artificial intelligence lovers to visit your company, investors to buy your company's shares, will you agree?
·Small fresh picture, simple interface, relax your eyes.
·Recycling garbage can find diamonds, don't you believe? Please try.
·Compare with global players, who is the first world's company?

【CONTACT US】
WECHAT（微信公众号）：Dea游戏
Facebook: The Era of AI(DeaAIEra)
